name: Fish With Cream Sauce
description: A fish served in sauce. Fresh fish filets were dried before pan-fried until crispy, then drizzled with a creamy white dressing and sprinkled with fresh mint. A unique dish that can be made through the simplest methods.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Fish With Cream Sauce
suspicious.description: A fish dish served in sauce. The outside was burnt in searing hot oil. It is rather hard not to notice the sharp contrast between the charcoal-black fish and the milk-white sauce. Only the meat inside seems edible... Wait, what's with this sourness?
suspicious.effect: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

normal.name: Fish With Cream Sauce
normal.description: A fish served in sauce. Fresh fish filets were dried before pan-fried until crispy, then drizzled with a creamy white dressing and sprinkled with fresh mint. A unique dish that can be made through the simplest methods.
normal.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.name: Delicious Fish With Cream Sauce
delicious.description: A fish dish served in sauce. The translucent fillet lies upon exquisite cream sauce. With only a small mouthful, one might even see fish leaping on the sea surface.
delicious.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.
